mapper.insert: insert into approvaldoc values(AP_DOC_SEQ.nextval, #{apFormNo}, #{apDocWriter}, #{apDocTitle}, #{apDocContent}, '0', 1, sysdate, null)
mapper.select: select f.ap_form_name, d.ap_doc_no, d.ap_doc_title, u.user_name, d.ap_doc_writer, p.project_code,d.ap_doc_createdate, d.ap_doc_enddate ,d.ap_doc_status from approvaldoc d join approvalform f on d.ap_form_no = f.ap_form_no join project_members p on d.ap_doc_writer = p.user_id join users u on p.user_id = u.user_id where ap_doc_writer = #{apDocWriter} and ap_doc_status in (0, -1) order by ap_doc_status desc
